pullRequest.title: Implement object store support for AliCloud
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implement JClouds BlobStore API using the Aliyun SDK for blob storage.
JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1889

nodes.bodyText:
Do we need all of these listed? Are not they already part of some library?
How we will keep the list up-to-date?
Extract it and rename if possible "AliCloud" to AlibabaCloud since this is the new official naming
Extract it in a separate function because such large block in map() is hard to read.

Can we rely on that logic ".endsWith("/") ? StorageType.FOLDER" ...
Is there a possibility to have folder without / in the end.
Can we check with other native oss function.
Also if this is the only option, let's use some contstant, I guess there it is something existing, that represent file separator.

What is that URI?
Is there will be a problem if the landscape does not have access to the internet and accessing this one?
Are you sure about http schema and not https?

Is it a problem if we call objectMetadata.setCacheControl(null)
The same from below ?

Is that true always?
Can we read the service binding and set it in ObjectStoreServiceInfoCreator ::createServiceInfoForAliCloud()

Why not to use ConsistencyModel.STRICT
In my understandings with eventual consisntency we could not read blobs immediately some cases which could be a problem when we store something and try to read it afterwards.
For detais about consistency, check CAP theorem

nodes.bodyText: Does this stream need to be closed?
Is it required this guava supplier to be used?
Could you extract this in a method?
Why is always the first element used? get(0)
why do call "doesBucketExist" with a container name?
